turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place an order from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which starbucks did you want to pickup from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Atwater, California on Bellevue and Shaffer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra strawberry infusion and light splash of passion tango.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright, can you say that again a little slower please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I'll take berry berry hibiscus lemonade Starbucks Refresher.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a very berry hibiscus lemmonade starbucks refresher, with light apple juice, 2 scoops blackberries, one scoop strawberry, light ice, 2 packets of splenda and coconut milk, from the starbucks on Bellvue and Shaffer in Attwater CA.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. But I want it I want it in a venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I also order a chicken wrap?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That location is sold out of them right now, I"m sorry.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Then, can I order a a two chocolate chip cookies?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you repeat my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a venti very berry hibiscus lemmonade starbucks refresher, with light apple juice, 2 scoops blackberries, one scoop strawberry, light ice, 2 packets of splenda and coconut milk, and 2 chocolate chip cookies from the starbucks on Bellvue and Shaffer in Attwater CA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, you're all set, the order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes and you'll get your reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a good day.

items.name: berry berry hibiscus lemonade Starbucks Refresher
very berry hibiscus lemmonade starbucks refresher
